content.query: CREATE DATABASE LHDW

-- CRIAR SCHEMAS CAMADAS MEDALLION
CREATE SCHEMA BRONZE
GO
CREATE SCHEMA SILVER
GO
CREATE SCHEMA GOLD
GO
--CRIADO PELO MANAGE SQL POOLS

CREATE SCHEMA BRONZE
GO
CREATE SCHEMA SILVER
GO
CREATE SCHEMA GOLD

-- CRIA FORMATO PARQUET
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO
--CRIA FORMATO CSV SKIP CABECALHO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'skipHeader_CSV') 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT skipHeader_CSV
WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS(
          FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
          STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
          FIRST_ROW = 2, 
          USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True)
)

-- Create master key in databases with some password (one-off per database)
USE LHDW;
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'TREINAMENTOSOLAR2022@!'
GO

--CRIAO DE CREDENTIAL
--Entrar no datalake e gerar chave SAS
USE LHDW;
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SASADLSTRNSOLAR
 WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
--GERADO SECRET VIA SAS
 SECRET = '?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bf&srt=sc&sp=rwdlacyx&se=2022-11-02T01:12:12Z&st=2022-09-12T17:12:12Z&spr=https&sig=2hgFfD4fo8kcmkztQ6l7t413%2BHZkR%2BTJLm68wuJH4C4%3D'
 GO

-- cria login
create login [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br] from external provider
GO

-- cria usuario
use DW01

CREATE user [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br] from login [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br]
GO
-- add role
alter ROLE db_owner ADD MEMBER [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br]

--adicionar contributor datalake

-- cria login
create login [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br] from external provider
GO

-- cria usuario
use lhdw

CREATE user [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br] from login [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br]
GO
-- add role
alter ROLE db_owner ADD MEMBER [bruno.galvincio@dataex.com.br]

--adicionar contributor datalake

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

-- PARA USERS INTERNOS -<
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources 
WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


--PARA USER EXTERNOS ->
--Entrar no datalake e gerar chave SAS
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources 
WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net_ext') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net_ext] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net',
		CREDENTIAL=[SASADLSTRNSOLAR]
	)
GO

--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.D_CATEGORIA
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.D_CATEGORIA (
	[ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	[NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/categoria/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO

--select * from SILVER.D_CATEGORIA

-- SELECT * FROM SILVER.D_CATEGORIA

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.[D_EXT_CATEGORIA1]
(
	[ID_CATEGORIA] [int]  NOT NULL,
	[NOME_CATEGORIA] [varchar](20) NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/silver/categoria',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
)

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'D_BULK_CATEGORIA' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'SILVER')
CREATE TABLE SILVER.D_BULK_CATEGORIA
	(
	 [ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	 [NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_D_BULK_CATEGORIA
--AS
--BEGIN

COPY INTO SILVER.D_BULK_CATEGORIA
(ID_CATEGORIA 1, NOME_CATEGORIA 2)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/categoria'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

	[NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	[ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	[NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	[ID_CIDADE] int,
	[CEP] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/cliente/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)

	(
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [NOME_CIDADE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [UF] nvarchar(4000)
	)

(ID_CIDADE 1, NOME_CIDADE 2, UF 3)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/cidade'

(

)

-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.VENDAS
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE SILVER.VENDAS (
	[NUM_VENDA] int,
	[DATA_VENDA] datetime2(7),
	[ID_CLIENTE] int,
	[ID_VENDEDOR] int,
	[STATUS] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/vendas/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]
	)
GO

--select * from SILVER.VENDAS

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'FATO_VENDAS' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'GOLD')
CREATE TABLE GOLD.FATO_VENDAS
	(
	 [NUM_VENDA] int,
	 [DATA_VENDA] datetime2(7),
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
	 [STATUS] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_VENDEDOR] int,
	 [NUM_SEQ] int,
	 [ID_PROD] int,
	 [QTDE] numeric(10,2),
	 [VAL_UNIT] numeric(10,2),
	 [VAL_TOTAL] numeric(10,2)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH([NUM_VENDA]),
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_FATO_VENDAS
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO GOLD.FATO_VENDAS
(NUM_VENDA 1, DATA_VENDA 2, ID_CLIENTE 3, STATUS 4, ID_VENDEDOR 5, NUM_SEQ 6, ID_PROD 7, QTDE 8, VAL_UNIT 9, VAL_TOTAL 10)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/gold/fato_vendas'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM GOLD.FATO_VENDAS
GO

	[NUM_VENDA] int,

	WITH (

--select * from SILVER.VENDAS_ITENS

--SQL DEDIDCADO
CREATE TABLE dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_SCD
	(
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
	 [NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [CEP] nvarchar(4000),
     [InsertedDate] [datetime] NOT NULL,
     [ModifiedDate] [datetime] NOT NULL,
     [HashKey] [char](64)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

CREATE VIEW GOLD.[VW_FATO_VENDAS]
	AS 
	SELECT A.NUM_VENDA,
	       A.DATA_VENDA,
		   A.ID_CLIENTE,
		   A.ID_VENDEDOR,
		   A.STATUS,
		   B.NUM_SEQ,
		   B.ID_PROD,
		   B.VAL_UNIT,
		   B.VAL_TOTAL
		   	FROM SILVER.VENDAS A
	INNER JOIN SILVER.VENDAS_ITENS B
	ON A.NUM_VENDA=B.NUM_VENDA

AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/unidade/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE VIEW dbo.vTableSizes
AS
WITH base
AS
(
SELECT
 GETDATE()                                                             AS  [execution_time]
, DB_NAME()                                                            AS  [database_name]
, s.name                                                               AS  [schema_name]
, t.name                                                               AS  [table_name]
, QUOTENAME(s.name)+'.'+QUOTENAME(t.name)                              AS  [two_part_name]
, nt.[name]                                                            AS  [node_table_name]
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY nt.[name] ORDER BY (SELECT NULL))     AS  [node_table_name_seq]
, tp.[distribution_policy_desc]                                        AS  [distribution_policy_name]
, c.[name]                                                             AS  [distribution_column]
, nt.[distribution_id]                                                 AS  [distribution_id]
, i.[type]                                                             AS  [index_type]
, i.[type_desc]                                                        AS  [index_type_desc]
, nt.[pdw_node_id]                                                     AS  [pdw_node_id]
, pn.[type]                                                            AS  [pdw_node_type]
, pn.[name]                                                            AS  [pdw_node_name]
, di.name                                                              AS  [dist_name]
, di.position                                                          AS  [dist_position]
, nps.[partition_number]                                               AS  [partition_nmbr]
, nps.[reserved_page_count]                                            AS  [reserved_space_page_count]
, nps.[reserved_page_count] - nps.[used_page_count]                    AS  [unused_space_page_count]
, nps.[in_row_data_page_count]
    + nps.[row_overflow_used_page_count]
    + nps.[lob_used_page_count]                                        AS  [data_space_page_count]
, nps.[reserved_page_count]
 - (nps.[reserved_page_count] - nps.[used_page_count])
 - ([in_row_data_page_count]
         + [row_overflow_used_page_count]+[lob_used_page_count])       AS  [index_space_page_count]
, nps.[row_count]                                                      AS  [row_count]
from
    sys.schemas s
INNER JOIN sys.tables t
    ON s.[schema_id] = t.[schema_id]
INNER JOIN sys.indexes i
    ON  t.[object_id] = i.[object_id]
    AND i.[index_id] <= 1
INNER JOIN sys.pdw_table_distribution_properties tp
    ON t.[object_id] = tp.[object_id]
INNER JOIN sys.pdw_table_mappings tm
    ON t.[object_id] = tm.[object_id]
INNER JOIN sys.pdw_nodes_tables nt
    ON tm.[physical_name] = nt.[name]
INNER JOIN sys.dm_pdw_nodes pn
    ON  nt.[pdw_node_id] = pn.[pdw_node_id]
INNER JOIN sys.pdw_distributions di
    ON  nt.[distribution_id] = di.[distribution_id]
INNER JOIN sys.dm_pdw_nodes_db_partition_stats nps
    ON nt.[object_id] = nps.[object_id]
    AND nt.[pdw_node_id] = nps.[pdw_node_id]
    AND nt.[distribution_id] = nps.[distribution_id]
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from sys.pdw_column_distribution_properties where distribution_ordinal = 1) cdp
    ON t.[object_id] = cdp.[object_id]
LEFT OUTER JOIN sys.columns c
    ON cdp.[object_id] = c.[object_id]
    AND cdp.[column_id] = c.[column_id]
WHERE pn.[type] = 'COMPUTE'
)
, size
AS
(
SELECT
   [execution_time]
,  [database_name]
,  [schema_name]
,  [table_name]
,  [two_part_name]
,  [node_table_name]
,  [node_table_name_seq]
,  [distribution_policy_name]
,  [distribution_column]
,  [distribution_id]
,  [index_type]
,  [index_type_desc]
,  [pdw_node_id]
,  [pdw_node_type]
,  [pdw_node_name]
,  [dist_name]
,  [dist_position]
,  [partition_nmbr]
,  [reserved_space_page_count]
,  [unused_space_page_count]
,  [data_space_page_count]
,  [index_space_page_count]
,  [row_count]
,  ([reserved_space_page_count] * 8.0)                                 AS [reserved_space_KB]
,  ([reserved_space_page_count] * 8.0)/1000                            AS [reserved_space_MB]
,  ([reserved_space_page_count] * 8.0)/1000000                         AS [reserved_space_GB]
,  ([reserved_space_page_count] * 8.0)/1000000000                      AS [reserved_space_TB]
,  ([unused_space_page_count]   * 8.0)                                 AS [unused_space_KB]
,  ([unused_space_page_count]   * 8.0)/1000                            AS [unused_space_MB]
,  ([unused_space_page_count]   * 8.0)/1000000                         AS [unused_space_GB]
,  ([unused_space_page_count]   * 8.0)/1000000000                      AS [unused_space_TB]
,  ([data_space_page_count]     * 8.0)                                 AS [data_space_KB]
,  ([data_space_page_count]     * 8.0)/1000                            AS [data_space_MB]
,  ([data_space_page_count]     * 8.0)/1000000                         AS [data_space_GB]
,  ([data_space_page_count]     * 8.0)/1000000000                      AS [data_space_TB]
,  ([index_space_page_count]  * 8.0)                                   AS [index_space_KB]
,  ([index_space_page_count]  * 8.0)/1000                              AS [index_space_MB]
,  ([index_space_page_count]  * 8.0)/1000000                           AS [index_space_GB]
,  ([index_space_page_count]  * 8.0)/1000000000                        AS [index_space_TB]
FROM base
)
SELECT *
FROM size
;

--Para identificar quais tabelas tm distoro de dados maior de 10%:
select *
from dbo.vTableSizes
where two_part_name in
    (
    select two_part_name
    from dbo.vTableSizes
    where row_count > 0
    group by two_part_name
    having (max(row_count * 1.000) - min(row_count * 1.000))/max(row_count * 1.000) >= .10
    )
order by two_part_name, row_count
;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.carros (
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[primeiro_nome] nvarchar(4000),
	[ultimo_nome] nvarchar(4000),
	[email] nvarchar(4000),
	[sexo] nvarchar(4000),
	[cidade] nvarchar(4000),
	[pais] nvarchar(4000),
	[codigo_pais] nvarchar(4000),
	[Time_zone] nvarchar(4000),
	[empresa] nvarchar(4000),
	[profissao] nvarchar(4000),
	[etnia] nvarchar(4000),
	[idioma] nvarchar(4000),
	[montadora] nvarchar(4000),
	[carro] nvarchar(4000),
	[nascimento] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/crm/output/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [treinamento_adlstrnsolar99_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM silver.carros
GO

--Esta consulta retorna as linhas e o espao por tabela. 
--Ele permite que voc veja quais tabelas so suas maiores tabelas e se 
-- elas so de rodzio, replicadas ou distribudas por hash. 
-- Nas tabelas distribudas em hash, a consulta exibe a coluna de distribuio.
SELECT
     database_name
,    schema_name
,    table_name
,    distribution_policy_name
,      distribution_column
,    index_type_desc
,    COUNT(distinct partition_nmbr) as nbr_partitions
,    SUM(row_count)                 as table_row_count
,    SUM(reserved_space_GB)         as table_reserved_space_GB
,    SUM(data_space_GB)             as table_data_space_GB
,    SUM(index_space_GB)            as table_index_space_GB
,    SUM(unused_space_GB)           as table_unused_space_GB
FROM
    dbo.vTableSizes
GROUP BY
     database_name
,    schema_name
,    table_name
,    distribution_policy_name
,      distribution_column
,    index_type_desc
ORDER BY
    table_reserved_space_GB desc
;

--Espao da tabela pelo tipo de distribuio

SELECT
     distribution_policy_name
,    SUM(row_count)                as table_type_row_count
,    SUM(reserved_space_GB)        as table_type_reserved_space_GB
,    SUM(data_space_GB)            as table_type_data_space_GB
,    SUM(index_space_GB)           as table_type_index_space_GB
,    SUM(unused_space_GB)          as table_type_unused_space_GB
FROM dbo.vTableSizes
GROUP BY distribution_policy_name
;

--Espao da tabela pelo tipo de ndice

SELECT
     index_type_desc
,    SUM(row_count)                as table_type_row_count
,    SUM(reserved_space_GB)        as table_type_reserved_space_GB
,    SUM(data_space_GB)            as table_type_data_space_GB
,    SUM(index_space_GB)           as table_type_index_space_GB
,    SUM(unused_space_GB)          as table_type_unused_space_GB
FROM dbo.vTableSizes
GROUP BY index_type_desc
;

--Resumo do espao de distribuio
SELECT
    distribution_id
,    SUM(row_count)                as total_node_distribution_row_count
,    SUM(reserved_space_MB)        as total_node_distribution_reserved_space_MB
,    SUM(data_space_MB)            as total_node_distribution_data_space_MB
,    SUM(index_space_MB)           as total_node_distribution_index_space_MB
,    SUM(unused_space_MB)          as total_node_distribution_unused_space_MB
FROM dbo.vTableSizes
GROUP BY     distribution_id
ORDER BY    distribution_id
;

--VERIFICAR FORMATOS EXISTENTES
SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats;  

--ELIMINAR FORMATO EXISTENTE
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT SynapseParquetFormat

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM
	(
	 [ID_CLIENTE] int,
     [CPF] VARCHAR(14),
     [EMAIL]VARCHAR(50),
	 [NOME_CLIENTE] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ENDERECO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [NUMERO] nvarchar(4000),
	 [ID_CIDADE] int,
	 [CEP] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

select * from dbo.SILVER_CLIENTE_DDM

--ATIVAR CDC

USE minierp    
GO   EXEC sys.sp_cdc_enable_db   GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/categoria/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

source: ## Criar um relatrio do Power BI usando o Apache Spark e o Azure Synapse Analytics

#### Execute as linhas a seguir para criar um dataframe do Spark, colando o cdigo em uma nova clula. Isso recupera os dados por meio da API do Conjunto de Dados em Aberto no Azure. A extrao de todos esses dados gera cerca de 1,5 bilho de linhas. O exemplo de cdigo a seguir usa start_date e end_date para aplicar um filtro que retorna um nico ms de dados.

%%pyspark
from azureml.opendatasets import NycTlcYellow
from dateutil import parser
from datetime import datetime

end_date = parser.parse('2018-06-06')
start_date = parser.parse('2018-05-01')
nyc_tlc = NycTlcYellow(start_date=start_date, end_date=end_date)
filtered_df = nyc_tlc.to_spark_dataframe()
#### Usando o SQL do Apache Spark, criaremos um banco de dados chamado NycTlcTutorial. Usaremos esse banco de dados para armazenar os resultados do nosso processamento de dados.
spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS NycTlcTutorial")

#### Em seguida, usaremos as operaes de dataframe do Spark para processar os dados. No seguinte cdigo, executaremos as seguintes transformaes:
#### 
#### A remoo de colunas que no so necessrias.
#### A remoo de excees/valores incorretos por meio da filtragem.
A criao de recursos, como tripTimeSecs e tipped, para anlise adicional.

from pyspark.sql.functions import unix_timestamp, date_format, col, when

taxi_df = filtered_df.select('totalAmount', 'fareAmount', 'tipAmount', 'paymentType', 'rateCodeId', 'passengerCount'\
                                , 'tripDistance', 'tpepPickupDateTime', 'tpepDropoffDateTime'\
                                , date_format('tpepPickupDateTime', 'hh').alias('pickupHour')\
                                , date_format('tpepPickupDateTime', 'EEEE').alias('weekdayString')\
                                , (unix_timestamp(col('tpepDropoffDateTime')) - unix_timestamp(col('tpepPickupDateTime'))).alias('tripTimeSecs')\
                                , (when(col('tipAmount') > 0, 1).otherwise(0)).alias('tipped')
                                )\
                        .filter((filtered_df.passengerCount > 0) & (filtered_df.passengerCount < 8)\
                                & (filtered_df.tipAmount >= 0) & (filtered_df.tipAmount <= 25)\
                                & (filtered_df.fareAmount >= 1) & (filtered_df.fareAmount <= 250)\
                                & (filtered_df.tipAmount < filtered_df.fareAmount)\
                                & (filtered_df.tripDistance > 0) & (filtered_df.tripDistance <= 100)\
                                & (filtered_df.rateCodeId <= 5)
                                & (filtered_df.paymentType.isin({"1", "2"})))
#### Por fim, salvaremos nosso dataframe usando o mtodo saveAsTable do Apache Spark. Isso permitir que voc consulte a mesma tabela mais tarde e conecte-se a ela usando pools de SQL sem servidor.
### CRIA DATAFRAMES PARA CARGA CAMADA SILVER

%%pyspark
dfcategoria = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/categoria/dbo.CATEGORIA.parquet', format='parquet')
dfcidade = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/cidade/dbo.CIDADE.parquet', format='parquet')
dfcliente = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/cliente/dbo.CLIENTE.parquet', format='parquet')
dfprodutos = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/produtos/dbo.PRODUTOS.parquet', format='parquet')
dfunidade = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/unidade/dbo.UNIDADE.parquet', format='parquet')
dfvendedores = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/vendedores/dbo.VENDEDORES.parquet', format='parquet')
dfvendas = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/vendas/dbo.VENDAS.parquet', format='parquet')
dfvenda_itens = spark.read.load('abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/vendas_itens/dbo.VENDA_ITENS.parquet', format='parquet')
#### GRAVANDO PARQUET DE BRONZE PARA SILVER
#### Join Parquet vendas e vendas itens

%%pyspark 
from pyspark.sql.functions import to_timestamp,date_format
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
join_fato_vendas = dfvendas.join(dfvenda_itens, dfvendas.NUM_VENDA == dfvenda_itens.NUM_VENDA)\
.select(dfvendas.NUM_VENDA,dfvendas.DATA_VENDA,dfvendas.ID_CLIENTE,dfvendas.STATUS,dfvendas.ID_VENDEDOR\
,dfvenda_itens.NUM_SEQ,dfvenda_itens.ID_PROD,dfvenda_itens.QTDE,dfvenda_itens.VAL_UNIT\
,dfvenda_itens.VAL_TOTAL\
#,date_format('DATA_VENDA','yyyyMMdd').cast('Int').alias('DATA_VENDA_KEY')\
#,date_format('DATA_VENDA','yyyyMMdd').cast('String').alias('DATA_VENDA_CHAVE')\
,date_format('DATA_VENDA','yyyyMMdd').alias('DATA_VENDA_CHAVE')\
,date_format('DATA_VENDA','yyyy').alias('ANO')\
,date_format('DATA_VENDA','MM').alias('MES')\
,date_format('DATA_VENDA','dd').alias('DIA')\
)
join_fato_vendas.show(10)

%%pyspark
##Escreve e salva arquivo Parquet particionado por ano
join_filtrado.write.partitionBy('ANO','MES').mode('overwrite').parquet("/gold/fato_vendas")

## Trip Data Aggregation 
### Group By Columns
1. year
2. Month
3. Pickup Location ID
4. Drop Off Location ID

### Aggregated Columns
1. Total Trip Count
2. Total Fare Amount

### Objetivo no notebook

Demonstrar a integrao entre o  Spark Pool e Serverless SQL Pool

1. Cria uma tabela agregada in Spark Pool
2. Acesso os dados do Serverless SQL Pool

#Defina os caminhos da pasta para que possam ser usados mais tarde.
bronze_folder_path = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze'
silver_folder_path = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'
gold_folder_path = 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/gold'
#Defina a spark  config para ser capaz de obter as colunas particionadas ano e ms como strings em vez de inteiros.

%%sql

-- Criar banco de dados para o qual vamos gravar os dados

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyc_taxi_ldw_spark
LOCATION 'abfss://treinamento@adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/gold';
# Leia os dados da camada prata prata a serem processados.

# Perform the required aggregations
# 1. Total trip count
# 2. Total fare amount
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

trip_data_green_agg_df = trip_data_green_df \
                        .groupBy("year", "month", "pu_location_id", "do_location_id") \
                        .agg(count(lit(1)).alias("total_trip_count"),
                        round(sum("fare_amount"), 2).alias("total_fare_amount"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption

trip_data_green_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year", "month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg")

%%pyspark
##Escreve e salva arquivo Parquet particionado por ano
df.write.partitionBy("ano").mode('append').parquet("/bronze/crm/output")

%%sql
SELECT
   ano
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlstrnsolar99.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/bronze/crm/output/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

#### O script cria um grupo de carga de trabalho chamado CEODemo para reservar recursos exclusivamente para o grupo de carga de trabalho. Por exemplo, um grupo de carga de trabalho com MIN_PERCENTAGE_RESOURCE definido como 10% e REQUEST_MIN_RESOURCE_GRANT_PERCENT definido como 5% tem simultaneidade 2 garantida.

%%sql

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.workload_management_workload_groups where name = 'CEODemo')
BEGIN
    Create WORKLOAD GROUP CEODemo WITH  
    ( MIN_PERCENTAGE_RESOURCE = 10        -- integer value
    ,REQUEST_MIN_RESOURCE_GRANT_PERCENT = 5 -- integer value
    ,CAP_PERCENTAGE_RESOURCE = 100
    )
END

****#### Na janela de consulta, substitua o script pelo seguinte para criar um **classificador** de carga de trabalho chamado CEODreamDemo que atribui um grupo de carga de trabalho e a importncia a solicitaes de entrada:

%%sql
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.workload_management_workload_classifiers where  name = 'CEODreamDemo')
BEGIN
    Create Workload Classifier CEODreamDemo with
    ( Workload_Group ='CEODemo',MemberName='asa.sql.workload02',IMPORTANCE = BELOW_NORMAL);
END
#### Na janela de consulta, substitua o script pelo seguinte para confirmar que no h nenhuma consulta ativa em execuo por asa.sql.workload02 (pode haver consultas suspensas):

%%sql
SELECT s.login_name, r.[Status], r.Importance, submit_time,
start_time ,s.session_id FROM sys.dm_pdw_exec_sessions s
JOIN sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests r ON s.session_id = r.session_id
WHERE s.login_name IN ('asa.sql.workload02') and Importance
is not NULL AND r.[status] in ('Running','Suspended')
ORDER BY submit_time, status
#### Ler/gravar dados na conta de armazenamento padro do ADLS do workspace do Synapse
Ler arquivo de dados do URI do Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 padro
